price: Baramubwira bati “Ba umwihoreye (ntumwice) we n’umuvandimwe we [Haruna (Aroni)], maze wohereze (ingabo) mu mijyi yose zikoranye (abarozi).”
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ أَرۡجِهۡ وَأَخَاهُ وَأَرۡسِلۡ فِي ٱلۡمَدَآئِنِ حَٰشِرِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: qālū arjih wa-akhāhu wa-arsil fī al-madāini ḥāshirīna
